data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Morovis.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Morovis, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Morovis be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Morovis who will make disciples who make disciples.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Morovis with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Franquez
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Franquez, Morovis, Puerto Rico.
Father, encourage the 9,884 believers in Morovis to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 9,884 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary:
the state of Morovis, Puerto Rico has a population of 30,400.

We estimate Morovis has 9,884 people who might know Jesus, 18,858 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,658 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Morovis, Puerto Rico so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.
